```dart
  static Map<String, dynamic> calculateVanKhi({
    required String purpose,
    required DateTime date,
    DateTime? birthDate,
    CalculationTracer? tracer,
  }) {
    tracer?.addHeader('STARTING VAN KHI CALCULATION');
    try {
      final bool isPersonalized = birthDate != null;
      tracer?.addDetail('Is Personalized: $isPersonalized');

      final noiKhiResult = LunarService.calculateNoiKhi(date);
      final khiThangFullResult = LunarService.getDetailedKhiThangInfo(date);

      Map<String, dynamic>? canCanResult;
      Map<String, dynamic>? chiChiResult;
      Map<String, dynamic>? napAmResult;

      if (isPersonalized) {
        canCanResult =
            VanKhiService.calculateCanCan(date, birthDate!, tracer: tracer);
        chiChiResult =
            VanKhiService.calculateChiChi(date, birthDate, tracer: tracer);
        napAmResult =
            VanKhiService.calculateNapAm(date, birthDate, tracer: tracer);
      }

      final double noiKhiScore =
          (noiKhiResult['score'] as num?)?.toDouble() ?? 0.0;
      final Map<String, String> khiThangScoreOnlyData =
          _calculateKhiThangScoreOnly(date);
      final double khiThangScore =
          double.tryParse(khiThangScoreOnlyData['score'] ?? '0.0') ?? 0.0;

      final double canCanScore = isPersonalized
          ? ((canCanResult?['score'] as num?)?.toDouble() ?? 0.0)
          : 0.0;
      final double chiChiScore = isPersonalized
          ? ((chiChiResult?['score'] as num?)?.toDouble() ?? 0.0)
          : 0.0;
      final double napAmScore = isPersonalized
          ? ((napAmResult?['score'] as num?)?.toDouble() ?? 0.0)
          : 0.0;
      tracer?.addHeader('Component Raw Scores');
      tracer?.addDetail('Noi Khi Score: $noiKhiScore');
      tracer?.addDetail('Khi Thang Score: $khiThangScore');
      if (isPersonalized) {
        tracer?.addDetail('Can-Can Score: $canCanScore');
        tracer?.addDetail('Chi-Chi Score: $chiChiScore');
        tracer?.addDetail('Nap Am Score: $napAmScore');
      }

      final double noiKhiPercent = TimeConstant
              .noiKhiScoreToPercentage[noiKhiScore.toStringAsFixed(1)] ??
          TimeConstant.noiKhiScoreToPercentage[noiKhiScore.toString()] ??
          TimeConstant.defaultScoreToPercentage(noiKhiScore);

      final double khiThangPercent = TimeConstant
              .khiThangScoreToPercentage[khiThangScore.toStringAsFixed(1)] ??
          TimeConstant.defaultScoreToPercentage(khiThangScore,
              minScore: -3.0, maxScore: 3.0);

      final double canCanPercent = isPersonalized
          ? (TimeConstant
                  .canCanAgeScoreToPercentage[canCanScore.toStringAsFixed(1)] ??
              TimeConstant.canCanAgeScoreToPercentage[canCanScore.toString()] ??
              TimeConstant.defaultScoreToPercentage(canCanScore,
                  minScore: -2.0, maxScore: 2.0))
          : 0.0;

      final double chiChiPercent = isPersonalized
          ? (TimeConstant
                  .chiChiAgeScoreToPercentage[chiChiScore.toStringAsFixed(1)] ??
              TimeConstant.chiChiAgeScoreToPercentage[chiChiScore.toString()] ??
              TimeConstant.defaultScoreToPercentage(chiChiScore))
          : 0.0;

      final double napAmPercent = isPersonalized
          ? (TimeConstant
                  .napAmAgeScoreToPercentage[napAmScore.toStringAsFixed(1)] ??
              TimeConstant.napAmAgeScoreToPercentage[napAmScore.toString()] ??
              TimeConstant.defaultScoreToPercentage(napAmScore))
          : 0.0;
      tracer?.addHeader('Component Percentages (0-100)');
      tracer?.addDetail('Noi Khi %: ${noiKhiPercent.toStringAsFixed(1)}');
      tracer?.addDetail('Khi Thang %: ${khiThangPercent.toStringAsFixed(1)}');
      if (isPersonalized) {
        tracer?.addDetail('Can-Can %: ${canCanPercent.toStringAsFixed(1)}');
        tracer?.addDetail('Chi-Chi %: ${chiChiPercent.toStringAsFixed(1)}');
        tracer?.addDetail('Nap Am %: ${napAmPercent.toStringAsFixed(1)}');
      }

      final Map<String, double> componentWeights = isPersonalized
          ? TimeConstant.vanKhiComponentWeightsFractionPersonalized
          : TimeConstant.vanKhiComponentWeightsFractionGeneral;
      tracer?.addHeader('Component Weights');
      tracer?.addDetail('Weights used: ${isPersonalized ? 'Personalized' : 'General'}');
      componentWeights.forEach((key, value) {
        tracer?.addDetail('$key Weight: $value');
      });


      final double noiKhiWeightedContribution =
          noiKhiPercent * componentWeights['NoiKhi']!;
      final double khiThangWeightedContribution =
          khiThangPercent * componentWeights['KhiThang']!;
      final double canCanWeightedContribution =
          isPersonalized ? (canCanPercent * componentWeights['CanCan']!) : 0.0;
      final double chiChiWeightedContribution =
          isPersonalized ? (chiChiPercent * componentWeights['ChiChi']!) : 0.0;
      final double napAmWeightedContribution =
          isPersonalized ? (napAmPercent * componentWeights['NapAm']!) : 0.0;

      double totalVanKhiPercentage;
      if (isPersonalized) {
        totalVanKhiPercentage = (noiKhiWeightedContribution +
                khiThangWeightedContribution +
                canCanWeightedContribution +
                chiChiWeightedContribution +
                napAmWeightedContribution)
            .clamp(0.0, 100.0);
      } else {
        totalVanKhiPercentage =
            (noiKhiWeightedContribution + khiThangWeightedContribution)
                .clamp(0.0, 100.0);
      }
      tracer?.addHeader('Final Van Khi Score');
      tracer?.addDetail(
          'Total Van Khi Percentage: ${totalVanKhiPercentage.toStringAsFixed(2)}');

      final double finalNormalizedVanKhiScore =
          (totalVanKhiPercentage / 100.0 * 4.0) - 2.0;
      tracer?.addDetail(
          'Final Normalized Score [-2, 2]: ${finalNormalizedVanKhiScore.toStringAsFixed(2)}');
      final issues = <Map<String, dynamic>>[];

      if (isPersonalized) {
        tracer?.addSubStep('Checking for Van Khi issues (e.g., L·ª•c Xung)');
        final String? chiChiRelationKey =
            chiChiResult?['relationKey'] as String?;
        const List<String> badChiChiRelationsForRules = [
          'L·ª•c xung'
        ];
        if (chiChiRelationKey != null &&
            badChiChiRelationsForRules.contains(chiChiRelationKey)) {
          tracer?.addDetail('Found potential issue: $chiChiRelationKey');
          final ruleLevel = VanKhiRules.getRule('CHI_CHI', chiChiRelationKey,
              purpose); 
          tracer?.addDetail('Rule level for purpose $purpose: $ruleLevel');
          if (ruleLevel == 'exclude' || ruleLevel == 'warn') {
            String reasonText =
                '${VanKhiRules.getChiChiWarningName(chiChiRelationKey)} v·ªõi tu·ªïi (${chiChiResult!['dayChi']}-${chiChiResult['birthChi']}).';
            issues.add({
              'level': ruleLevel,
              'source': 'VanKhi_ChiChi',
              'reason': reasonText,
              'details': {
                'relation': chiChiRelationKey,
                'dayChi': chiChiResult['dayChi'],
                'birthChi': chiChiResult['birthChi'],
                'purpose': purpose,
              }
            });
            tracer?.addDetail('-> Added issue: $reasonText');
          }
        }
      }

      String type;
      if (finalNormalizedVanKhiScore >= 1.5)
        type = 'R·∫•t t·ªët';
      else if (finalNormalizedVanKhiScore >= 0.5)
        type = 'T·ªët';
      else if (finalNormalizedVanKhiScore > -0.5)
        type = 'Trung b√¨nh';
      else if (finalNormalizedVanKhiScore >= -1.5)
        type = 'K√©m';
      else
        type = 'R·∫•t x·∫•u';
      tracer?.addDetail('Final Van Khi Rating: $type');
      tracer?.addHeader('VAN KHI CALCULATION FINISHED');

      return {
        'normalizedScore': finalNormalizedVanKhiScore.clamp(-2.0, 2.0),
        'type': type,
        'issues': issues.toSet().toList(),
        'details': {
          'noiKhi': {
            'score': noiKhiScore,
            'percentage': noiKhiPercent,
            'description': noiKhiResult['description']
          },
          'khiThang': {
            'score': khiThangScore,
            'percentage': khiThangPercent,
            'description': khiThangFullResult['analysis'],
            'conclusion': khiThangFullResult['conclusion']
          },
          'canCan': isPersonalized
              ? {
                  'score': canCanScore,
                  'percentage': canCanPercent,
                  'description': canCanResult?['description']
                }
              : null,
          'chiChi': isPersonalized
              ? {
                  'score': chiChiScore,
                  'percentage': chiChiPercent,
                  'description': chiChiResult?['description']
                }
              : null,
          'napAm': isPersonalized
              ? {
                  'score': napAmScore,
                  'percentage': napAmPercent,
                  'description': napAmResult?['description']
                }
              : null,
          'totalVanKhiPercentage': totalVanKhiPercentage,
          'isPersonalizedCalculation': isPersonalized,
        }
      };
    } catch (e, s) {
      final errorMsg = "L·ªói nghi√™m tr·ªçng khi t√≠nh V·∫≠n Kh√≠";
      LoggerUtils.error(errorMsg, e, s);
      tracer?.addDetail('FATAL ERROR: $errorMsg. $e');
      return {
        'normalizedScore': 0.0,
        'type': 'L·ªói h·ªá th·ªëng',
        'issues': [],
        'details': {
          'error': 'L·ªói nghi√™m tr·ªçng trong qu√° tr√¨nh t√≠nh to√°n V·∫≠n Kh√≠'
        }
      };
    }
  }

  static Map<String, String> _calculateKhiThangScoreOnly(DateTime date) {
    try {
      final canChiDay = LunarService.getCanChiDay(date);
      final canChiMonth = LunarService.getCanChiMonth(date);
      final dayParts = canChiDay.split(' ');
      final monthParts = canChiMonth.split(' ');
      if (dayParts.length != 2 || monthParts.length != 2)
        return {'score': '0.0'};

      final dayCan = dayParts[0];
      final dayChi = dayParts[1];
      final monthCan = monthParts[0];
      final monthChi = monthParts[1];
      final dayCanHanh = TimeConstant.canToHanh[dayCan] ?? 'N/A';
      final dayChiHanh = TimeConstant.chiToHanh[dayChi] ?? 'N/A';
      final monthCanHanh = TimeConstant.canToHanh[monthCan] ?? 'N/A';
      final monthChiHanh = TimeConstant.chiToHanh[monthChi] ?? 'N/A';

      double totalScore = 0;
      String canRelationKey = "Trung t√≠nh";
      if (dayCanHanh != 'N/A' &&
          monthCanHanh != 'N/A' &&
          dayCanHanh != "Kh√¥ng r√µ" &&
          monthCanHanh != "Kh√¥ng r√µ") {
        if (NguHanhRelationService.isSinh(monthCanHanh, dayCanHanh))
          canRelationKey = "Th√°ng sinh Ng√†y";
        else if (monthCanHanh == dayCanHanh)
          canRelationKey = "ƒê·ªìng h√†nh";
        else if (NguHanhRelationService.isSinh(dayCanHanh, monthCanHanh))
          canRelationKey = "Ng√†y sinh Th√°ng";
        else if (NguHanhRelationService.isKhac(monthCanHanh, dayCanHanh))
          canRelationKey = "Th√°ng kh·∫Øc Ng√†y";
        else if (NguHanhRelationService.isKhac(dayCanHanh, monthCanHanh))
          canRelationKey = "Ng√†y kh·∫Øc Th√°ng";
      }
      totalScore += TimeConstant.khiThangCanCanScores[canRelationKey] ?? 0.0;

      String chiRelationKey = "Trung t√≠nh";
      if (dayChiHanh != 'N/A' &&
          monthChiHanh != 'N/A' &&
          dayChiHanh != "Kh√¥ng r√µ" &&
          monthChiHanh != "Kh√¥ng r√µ") {
        if (NguHanhRelationService.isSinh(monthChiHanh, dayChiHanh))
          chiRelationKey = "Th√°ng sinh Ng√†y";
        else if (monthChiHanh == dayChiHanh)
          chiRelationKey = "ƒê·ªìng h√†nh";
        else if (NguHanhRelationService.isSinh(dayChiHanh, monthChiHanh))
          chiRelationKey = "Ng√†y sinh Th√°ng";
        else if (NguHanhRelationService.isKhac(monthChiHanh, dayChiHanh))
          chiRelationKey = "Th√°ng kh·∫Øc Ng√†y";
        else if (NguHanhRelationService.isKhac(dayChiHanh, monthChiHanh))
          chiRelationKey = "Ng√†y kh·∫Øc Th√°ng";
      }
      totalScore += TimeConstant.khiThangChiChiScores[chiRelationKey] ?? 0.0;

      return {'score': totalScore.toStringAsFixed(1)};
    } catch (e) {
      LoggerUtils.error("L·ªói t√≠nh ƒëi·ªÉm Kh√≠ Th√°ng (score only)", e);
      return {'score': '0.0'};
    }
  }
```

```dart
// File: lib/app/modules/detail/services/calculator/home_chart_calculator.dart

import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/modules/detail/services/calculator/good_bad_day_service.dart';

/// L·ªõp ch·ª©a c√°c h√†m t√≠nh to√°n cho bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì ·ªü m√†n h√¨nh Home.
/// C√°c h√†m c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c g·ªçi b·ªüi `compute` ƒë·ªÉ ch·∫°y trong m·ªôt Isolate ri√™ng.
class HomeChartCalculator {
  /// D·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë·∫ßu v√†o cho h√†m t√≠nh to√°n trong Isolate.
  /// Ph·∫£i t·∫°o class ri√™ng v√¨ `compute` ch·ªâ nh·∫≠n m·ªôt tham s·ªë.
  final DateTime? birthDate;

  HomeChartCalculator({this.birthDate});
}

@pragma('vm:entry-point')

/// H√†m top-level ƒë·ªÉ t√≠nh to√°n d·ªØ li·ªáu bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì.
/// H√†m n√†y nh·∫≠n v√†o m·ªôt object `HomeChartCalculator` v√† tr·∫£ v·ªÅ danh s√°ch c√°c ƒëi·ªÉm `FlSpot`.
/// N√≥ ƒë∆∞·ª£c thi·∫øt k·∫ø ƒë·ªÉ ch·∫°y trong m·ªôt Isolate ri√™ng bi·ªát th√¥ng qua `compute`.
Future<List<FlSpot>> calculateChartDataForHome(
    HomeChartCalculator input) async {
  ensureServicesAndConstantsForIsolate();

  final List<FlSpot> spots = [];
  final DateTime today = DateTime.now();
  final DateTime? birthDate = input.birthDate;

  // L·∫∑p qua 7 ng√†y, b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu t·ª´ h√¥m nay
  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
    // X√°c ƒë·ªãnh ng√†y c·∫ßn t√≠nh to√°n
    final date = DateTime(today.year, today.month, today.day + i);

    // T√°i s·ª≠ d·ª•ng service t√≠nh ƒëi·ªÉm chi ti·∫øt ƒë√£ c√≥
    final scoreData = GoodBadDayService.calculateDayScore(
      date,
      birthDate, // birthDate c√≥ th·ªÉ null n·∫øu ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng ch∆∞a ƒëƒÉng nh·∫≠p/c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t
      'TOT_XAU_CHUNG', // M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch lu√¥n ƒë∆∞·ª£c c·ªë ƒë·ªãnh l√† "T·ªët X·∫•u Chung"
    );

    // L·∫•y ƒëi·ªÉm ph·∫ßn trƒÉm t·ª´ k·∫øt qu·∫£
    final points = scoreData['percentage'] as double;

    // T·∫°o ƒëi·ªÉm FlSpot:
    // - Tr·ª•c x: 1.0 cho h√¥m nay, 2.0 cho ng√†y mai,...
    // - Tr·ª•c y: ƒêi·ªÉm ph·∫ßn trƒÉm (0-100)
    final x = (i + 1).toDouble();
    spots.add(FlSpot(x, points));
  }

  // Tr·∫£ v·ªÅ danh s√°ch c√°c ƒëi·ªÉm ƒë√£ ƒë∆∞·ª£c t√≠nh to√°n
  return spots;
}
```

```dart
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/modules/detail/services/constants/element_score_constant.dart';

class NhiThapBatTuService {
  // L·∫•y ƒëi·ªÉm ƒë√°nh gi√° sao theo m·ª•c ƒë√≠ch
  static double getStarRating(String starName, String purpose) {
    // N·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ m·ª•c ƒë√≠ch c·ª• th·ªÉ ho·∫∑c sao kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a, tr·∫£ v·ªÅ t·ª´ TOT_XAU_CHUNG
    if (!NhiThapBatTuConstant.STAR_RATING_BY_PURPOSE.containsKey(purpose) ||
        !NhiThapBatTuConstant.STAR_RATING_BY_PURPOSE[purpose]!
            .containsKey(starName)) {
      return NhiThapBatTuConstant
              .STAR_RATING_BY_PURPOSE['TOT_XAU_CHUNG']![starName] ??
          0.0;
    }

    return NhiThapBatTuConstant.STAR_RATING_BY_PURPOSE[purpose]![starName]!;
  }

  // C√°c sao lo·∫°i b·ªè tuy·ªát ƒë·ªëi theo m·ª•c ƒë√≠ch, T·ª∞ ƒê·ªòNG TR√çCH T·ª™ STAR_RATING_BY_PURPOSE C√ì ƒêI·ªÇM -2.0
  static final Map<String, List<String>> EXCLUSION_STARS =
      _extractExclusionStars();

  static Map<String, List<String>> _extractExclusionStars() {
    final Map<String, List<String>> exclusions = {};
    NhiThapBatTuConstant.STAR_RATING_BY_PURPOSE.forEach((purpose, starRatings) {
      final List<String> excludedForPurpose = [];
      starRatings.forEach((starName, rating) {
        if (rating == -2.0) {
          excludedForPurpose.add(starName);
        }
      });
      if (excludedForPurpose.isNotEmpty) {
        exclusions[purpose] = excludedForPurpose;
      }
    });
    return exclusions;
  }

  // REMOVED: checkStarIssues method - no longer create exclude issues for 28Tu stars
}
```

```dart
  static Map<String, dynamic> calculateDayScoreForPurpose(

    final result =

    final issues = result['issues'] as List<Map<String, dynamic>>? ?? [];
    return issues.any((issue) => issue['level'] == 'exclude');
  }

  // Check if day has warning issues (NEW LOGIC)
  static bool hasWarningIssue(
      DateTime date, DateTime? birthDate, String purpose) {
    final result =
        GoodBadDayService.calculateDayScore(date, birthDate, purpose);
    final issues = result['issues'] as List<Map<String, dynamic>>? ?? [];
    // Only true if there are warnings AND no exclusions
    bool hasWarn = issues.any((issue) => issue['level'] == 'warn');
    bool hasExclude = issues.any((issue) => issue['level'] == 'exclude');
    return hasWarn && !hasExclude;
  }

  // Get detailed evaluation string (NEW LOGIC)
  static String getDayEvaluation(
      DateTime date, DateTime? birthDate, String purpose) {
    final result =
        GoodBadDayService.calculateDayScore(date, birthDate, purpose);
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    final purposeDisplay = PURPOSE_DISPLAY_NAMES[purpose] ?? purpose;
    final issues = result['issues'] as List<Map<String, dynamic>>? ?? [];

    final exclusionIssues =
        issues.where((i) => i['level'] == 'exclude').toList();
    final warningIssues = issues.where((i) => i['level'] == 'warn').toList();

    buffer.writeln('üìÖ ƒê√°nh gi√° ng√†y ${date.day}/${date.month}/${date.year}:');
    buffer.writeln('M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch: $purposeDisplay');

    // Display Exclusions if any
    if (exclusionIssues.isNotEmpty) {
      buffer.writeln('\n‚õî KH√îNG PH√ô H·ª¢P (K·ª¥):');
      for (final issue in exclusionIssues) {
        buffer.writeln('- ${issue['reason']}');
      }
      // Still display score, but maybe less prominently in UI
      buffer.writeln(
          '\nƒêi·ªÉm (tham kh·∫£o): ${result['percentage'].toStringAsFixed(1)}% (${result['rating']})');
    } else {
      // Display Score and Rating normally
      buffer.writeln(
          'ƒêi·ªÉm: ${result['percentage'].toStringAsFixed(1)}% (${result['rating']})');

      // Display Warnings if any (only if no exclusions)
      if (warningIssues.isNotEmpty) {
        buffer.writeln('\n‚ö†Ô∏è L∆ØU √ù / C·∫¶N C√ÇN NH·∫ÆC:');
        for (final issue in warningIssues) {
          buffer.writeln('- ${issue['reason']}');
        }
      }
    }

    // Always display score details
    buffer.writeln('\nüìù Chi ti·∫øt ƒëi·ªÉm th√†nh ph·∫ßn (thang [-2, 2]):');
    try {
      buffer.writeln(
          '- V·∫≠n kh√≠: ${result['vanKhi']['score'].toStringAsFixed(1)}');
    } catch (_) {}
    try {
      buffer.writeln(
          '- Sao c√°t/hung: ${result['catHung']['score'].toStringAsFixed(1)}');
    } catch (_) {}
    try {
      buffer.writeln(
          '- Nh·ªã th·∫≠p b√°t t√∫: ${result['tu']['details']['name']} (${result['tu']['score'].toStringAsFixed(1)})');
    } catch (_) {}
    try {
      buffer.writeln(
          '- Th·∫≠p nh·ªã tr·ª±c: ${result['truc']['details']['name']} (${result['truc']['score'].toStringAsFixed(1)})');
    } catch (_) {}

    // Add raw details for debugging if needed (optional)
    // buffer.writeln('\n--- DEBUG ---');
    // buffer.writeln('Raw Issues: $issues');
    // buffer.writeln('Van Khi Details: ${result['vanKhi']['details']}');
    // buffer.writeln('Cat Hung Details: ${result['catHung']['details']}');

    return buffer.toString();
  }
}
```

### calculator/cat_hung_service.dart

```dart
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/modules/detail/services/constants/element_score_constant.dart';
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/modules/detail/services/lunar_service.dart';
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/utils/logger_utils.dart';

class CatHungService {
  // Evaluate good/bad stars for a purpose, returning score and issues
  // *** ƒê√É C·∫¨P NH·∫¨T LOGIC CHU·∫®N H√ìA THEO C√îNG TH·ª®C T√ÄI LI·ªÜU ***
  static Map<String, dynamic> evaluateCatHung(DateTime date, String purpose) {
    final catTinhList = LunarService.getNgocHapCatTinh(date);
    final hungSatList = LunarService.getNgocHapHungSat(date);
    final issues = <Map<String, dynamic>>[]; // Unified list for issues

    // 1. T√≠nh ƒëi·ªÉm th√¥ (logic gi·ªØ nguy√™n)
    double catScoreRaw = 0.0;
    int catStarsCount = 0;
    if (catTinhList != null && catTinhList is List) {
      catStarsCount = catTinhList.length;
      for (final star in catTinhList) {
        if (star is Map && star.containsKey('name')) {
          final starName = star['name'] as String;
          catScoreRaw += getStarRatingForPurpose(starName, purpose, true);
        }
      }
    }

    double hungScoreRaw = 0.0;
    int hungStarsCount = 0;
    if (hungSatList != null && hungSatList is List) {
      hungStarsCount = hungSatList.length;
      for (final star in hungSatList) {
        if (star is Map && star.containsKey('name')) {
          final starName = star['name'] as String;
          // REMOVED: No longer create exclude issues for CatHung stars
          hungScoreRaw += getStarRatingForPurpose(starName, purpose, false);
        }
      }
    }

    // T·ªïng ƒëi·ªÉm th√¥ th·ª±c t·∫ø (ch√≠nh l√† 'x' trong c√¥ng th·ª©c)
    final double x = catScoreRaw + hungScoreRaw;
    final totalStarCount = catStarsCount + hungStarsCount;

    // 2. --- L·∫•y gi√° tr·ªã x_min, x_max t·ª´ Constant ---
    // S·ª≠ d·ª•ng purpose, fallback v·ªÅ TOT_XAU_CHUNG n·∫øu kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y
    final String effectivePurpose =
        CatHungConstant.purposeMinMaxScores.containsKey(purpose)
            ? purpose
            : 'TOT_XAU_CHUNG';
    final Map<String, double>? minMaxData =
        CatHungConstant.purposeMinMaxScores[effectivePurpose];

    // G√°n gi√° tr·ªã m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh n·∫øu kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y (c·∫ßn xem x√©t l·∫°i gi√° tr·ªã m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh n√†y)
    final double x_min = minMaxData?['min'] ?? -20.0; // V√≠ d·ª• m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh
    final double x_max = minMaxData?['max'] ?? 20.0; // V√≠ d·ª• m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh
    final double abs_x_min = x_min.abs(); // L·∫•y gi√° tr·ªã tuy·ªát ƒë·ªëi c·ªßa x_min

    if (minMaxData == null) {
      LoggerUtils.warning(
          "CatHungService: Kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y min/max scores cho purpose '$purpose', d√πng m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh c·ªßa '$effectivePurpose'.");
    }

    // 3. --- √ÅP D·ª§NG C√îNG TH·ª®C T√çNH PH·∫¶N TRƒÇM ---
    double percentage = 50.0; // Gi√° tr·ªã m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh n·∫øu c√≥ l·ªói

    if (x <= 0) {
      // Tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p 1: x <= 0
      if (abs_x_min > 0) {
        // Ch·ªâ t√≠nh khi x_min < 0
        percentage = ((x + abs_x_min) / abs_x_min) * 50.0;
      } else {
        // N·∫øu x_min >= 0 th√¨ b·∫•t k·ª≥ x <= 0 n√†o c≈©ng coi l√† ƒë·∫°t m·ªëc 0 ƒëi·ªÉm th√¥ -> 50%
        percentage = 50.0;
      }
    } else {
      // x > 0
      // Tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p 2: x > 0
      if (x_max > 0) {
        // Ch·ªâ t√≠nh khi x_max > 0
        percentage = (x / x_max) * 50.0 + 50.0;
      } else {
        // N·∫øu x_max <= 0 th√¨ b·∫•t k·ª≥ x > 0 n√†o c≈©ng v∆∞·ª£t ng∆∞·ª°ng kh·∫£o s√°t
        // Ho·∫∑c g√°n 100%, ho·∫∑c 50% n·∫øu coi l√† kh√¥ng th·ªÉ t·ªët h∆°n
        percentage = 100.0; // Theo logic clamp ·ªü b∆∞·ªõc sau th√¨ g√°n 100 l√† h·ª£p l√Ω
      }
    }

    // 4. --- Gi·ªõi h·∫°n ph·∫ßn trƒÉm trong kho·∫£ng [0, 100] ---
    percentage = percentage.clamp(0.0, 100.0);

    // 5. --- QUY ƒê·ªîI NG∆Ø·ª¢C T·ª™ PH·∫¶N TRƒÇM SANG THANG ƒêI·ªÇM [-2, 2] ---
    // C√¥ng th·ª©c: score = (percentage / 50.0) - 2.0
    // Khi percentage = 0%, score = (0 / 50) - 2 = -2
    // Khi percentage = 50%, score = (50 / 50) - 2 = 1 - 2 = -1 (L∆ØU √ù: ƒêi·ªÉm 0 th√¥ ·ª©ng v·ªõi 50% nh∆∞ng khi quy ƒë·ªïi l·∫°i ra -1 ???)
    // Khi percentage = 100%, score = (100 / 50) - 2 = 2 - 2 = 0 (L∆ØU √ù: 100% l·∫°i ra 0 ???)

    // *** ƒêI·ªÄU CH·ªàNH C√îNG TH·ª®C QUY ƒê·ªîI NG∆Ø·ª¢C ***
    // ƒê·ªÉ √°nh x·∫° [0, 100] v·ªÅ [-2, 2] m·ªôt c√°ch tuy·∫øn t√≠nh, v·ªõi 50% l√† ƒëi·ªÉm 0:
    // score = (percentage - 50.0) * (4.0 / 100.0)
    // Ho·∫∑c ƒë∆°n gi·∫£n h∆°n: score = (percentage / 25.0) - 2.0
    // Ki·ªÉm tra:
    // percentage = 0   -> score = (0 / 25) - 2 = -2
    // percentage = 50  -> score = (50 / 25) - 2 = 2 - 2 = 0
    // percentage = 100 -> score = (100 / 25) - 2 = 4 - 2 = 2
    double score = (percentage / 25.0) - 2.0;

    // ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o score cu·ªëi c√πng v·∫´n trong [-2, 2] do c√≥ th·ªÉ sai s·ªë d·∫•u ph·∫©y ƒë·ªông
    score = score.clamp(-2.0, 2.0);
    // --- K·∫æT TH√öC QUY ƒê·ªîI NG∆Ø·ª¢C ---

    // 6. Tr·∫£ v·ªÅ k·∫øt qu·∫£
    return {
      'score': score, // ƒêi·ªÉm cu·ªëi c√πng theo thang [-2, 2]
      'issues': issues, // Danh s√°ch c√°c v·∫•n ƒë·ªÅ lo·∫°i tr·ª´
      'details': {
        'catScoreRaw': catScoreRaw,
        'hungScoreRaw': hungScoreRaw,
        'totalScoreRaw': x, // ƒêi·ªÉm th√¥ (x)
        'percentage': percentage, // Ph·∫ßn trƒÉm t√≠nh ƒë∆∞·ª£c [0, 100]
        'x_min_used': x_min, // Gi√° tr·ªã min d√πng ƒë·ªÉ t√≠nh
        'x_max_used': x_max, // Gi√° tr·ªã max d√πng ƒë·ªÉ t√≠nh
        'catStarsCount': catStarsCount,
        'hungStarsCount': hungStarsCount,
        'catStars': catTinhList,
        'hungStars': hungSatList,
      }
    };
  }

  // Ki·ªÉm tra sao c√≥ g√¢y lo·∫°i b·ªè cho m·ª•c ƒë√≠ch kh√¥ng
  static bool _isStarExcludedForPurpose(String starName, String purpose) {
    return CatHungConstant.exclusionStars.containsKey(purpose) &&
        CatHungConstant.exclusionStars[purpose]!.contains(starName);
  }

  // L·∫•y ƒëi·ªÉm sao theo m·ª•c ƒë√≠ch
  static double getStarRatingForPurpose(
      String starName, String purpose, bool isCatTinh) {
    // N·∫øu c√≥ rating ƒë·∫∑c bi·ªát cho m·ª•c ƒë√≠ch v√† sao n√†y, tr·∫£ v·ªÅ n√≥
    if (CatHungConstant.starRatings.containsKey(purpose) &&
        CatHungConstant.starRatings[purpose]!.containsKey(starName)) {
      return CatHungConstant.starRatings[purpose]![starName]!;
    }

    // N·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ trong b·∫£ng m·ª•c ƒë√≠ch c·ª• th·ªÉ, th·ª≠ l·∫•y t·ª´ TOT_XAU_CHUNG
    if (CatHungConstant.starRatings.containsKey('TOT_XAU_CHUNG') &&
        CatHungConstant.starRatings['TOT_XAU_CHUNG']!.containsKey(starName)) {
      return CatHungConstant.starRatings['TOT_XAU_CHUNG']![starName]!;
    }

    // N·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ trong b·∫£ng, tr·∫£ v·ªÅ gi√° tr·ªã m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh d·ª±a v√†o lo·∫°i sao
    return isCatTinh ? 0.5 : -0.5;
  }

  // H√†m ti·ªán √≠ch ƒë·ªÉ l·∫•y t√™n hi·ªÉn th·ªã sao
  static String getStarDisplayName(String starName) {
    const starDisplayNames = {
      'Thi√™n ƒê·ª©c': 'Thi√™n ƒê·ª©c',
      'Thi√™n ƒê·ª©c H·ª£p': 'Thi√™n ƒê·ª©c H·ª£p',
      'Nguy·ªát ƒê·ª©c': 'Nguy·ªát ƒê·ª©c',
      'Nguy·ªát ƒê·ª©c H·ª£p': 'Nguy·ªát ƒê·ª©c H·ª£p',
      'Thi√™n H·ª∑': 'Thi√™n H·ª∑',
      'Thi√™n Ph√∫ (Tr·ª±c M√£n)': 'Thi√™n Ph√∫ (Tr·ª±c M√£n)',
      'Thi√™n Qu√Ω': 'Thi√™n Qu√Ω',
      'Thi√™n X√°': 'Thi√™n X√°',
      'Sinh Kh√≠': 'Sinh Kh√≠',
      'Thi√™n Ph√∫c': 'Thi√™n Ph√∫c',
```

```dart
        'Th·ª• T·ª≠': 'warn',
        'Tr√πng Ph·ª•c': 'warn'
      },
    };

    for (final tabooDay in tabooDays) {
      if (tabooDay is! Map || !tabooDay.containsKey('name')) continue;

      final tabooName = tabooDay['name'] as String;
      tracer?.addDetail('Evaluating taboo day: $tabooName');
      final description = tabooDay['description'] as String? ?? '';
      String severity = 'none'; // Default

      // Determine severity
      if (severityByPurpose.containsKey(purpose) &&
          severityByPurpose[purpose]!.containsKey(tabooName)) {
        severity = severityByPurpose[purpose]![tabooName]!;
        tracer?.addDetail("-> Severity for purpose '$purpose': $severity");
      } else if (severityByPurpose['TOT_XAU_CHUNG']!.containsKey(tabooName)) {
        severity = severityByPurpose['TOT_XAU_CHUNG']![tabooName]!;
        tracer?.addDetail('-> Severity from default TOT_XAU_CHUNG: $severity');
      } else {
        tracer?.addDetail('-> No specific rule for this taboo day and purpose. Severity: none.');
      }

      if (severity == 'exclude' || severity == 'warn') {
        String reasonText =
            '$tabooName: $description';

        issues.add({
          'level': severity,
          'source': 'Taboo',
          'reason': reasonText,
          'details': {'tabooName': tabooName} // Optional details
        });
        tracer?.addDetail("-> Added issue with level '$severity': $reasonText");
      }
    }

    // Return only the list of issues
    return {'issues': issues};
  }
```

```dart
  static double defaultScoreToPercentage(double score,
      {double minScore = -2.0, double maxScore = 2.0}) {
    if (maxScore <= minScore) {
      // X·ª≠ l√Ω tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p minScore >= maxScore ƒë·ªÉ tr√°nh chia cho 0
      return score >= minScore ? 100.0 : 0.0;
    }
    // Chu·∫©n h√≥a ƒëi·ªÉm v·ªÅ kho·∫£ng [0, 1]
    final double normalized =
        (score.clamp(minScore, maxScore) - minScore) / (maxScore - minScore);
    return (normalized * 100.0)
        .clamp(0.0, 100.0); // ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o k·∫øt qu·∫£ trong [0, 100]
  }
```

```dart
  static String getMeaning(
      String source, String starNameKey, String purposeTechnicalKey) {
    Map<String, Map<String, String>>? sourceMeaningsMap;
    String starDialogDisplayName = starNameKey;

    if (source == 'CatHung') {
      sourceMeaningsMap = catHungMeanings;
      starDialogDisplayName = CatHungService.getStarDisplayName(starNameKey);
    } else if (source == '28Tu') {
      sourceMeaningsMap = nhiThapBatTuMeanings;
      starDialogDisplayName =
          TimeConstant.nhiThapBatTuFullNames[starNameKey] ?? starNameKey;
    } else if (source == '12Truc') {
      sourceMeaningsMap = thapNhiTrucMeanings;

    } else {
```

```dart
        "endTimeLocal": r'''2100-12-22T02:52:51+07:00''',
        "longitude": 255.0,
      },
      {
        "name": "ƒê√¥ng Ch√≠",
        "startTimeLocal": r"""2100-12-22T02:52:51+07:00""",
        "endTimeLocal": r'''2101-01-05T20:08:50+07:00''',
        "longitude": 270.0,
      },
    ],
  };

  /// [REVISED] T√¨m ti·∫øt kh√≠ cho m·ªôt DateTime c·ª• th·ªÉ, s·ª≠ d·ª•ng th·ªùi gian ch√≠nh x√°c.
  /// So s√°nh tr·ª±c ti·∫øp v·ªõi startTimeLocal v√† endTimeLocal.
  /// ∆Øu ti√™n ti·∫øt kh√≠ m·ªõi n·∫øu th·ªùi gian tr√πng kh·ªõp v·ªõi th·ªùi ƒëi·ªÉm b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu.
  /// Tr·∫£ v·ªÅ ti·∫øt kh√≠ ƒëang c√≥ hi·ªáu l·ª±c T·∫†I TH·ªúI ƒêI·ªÇM ch√≠nh x√°c ƒë√≥.
  static Map<String, dynamic>? getSolarTermForPreciseTime(
      DateTime targetDateTime) {
    final targetDateTimeLocal = targetDateTime.toLocal();
    final year = targetDateTimeLocal.year;

    final yearData = solarTermsByYear[year];
    if (yearData != null) {
      for (final term in yearData) {
        try {
          final DateTime startTime =
              DateTime.parse(term["startTimeLocal"]).toLocal();
          final String? endTimeStr = term["endTimeLocal"];
          DateTime? endTime =
              endTimeStr != null ? DateTime.parse(endTimeStr).toLocal() : null;

          if (!targetDateTimeLocal.isBefore(startTime) &&
              (endTime == null || targetDateTimeLocal.isBefore(endTime))) {
            return term;
          }
        } catch (e) {
          print(
              "L·ªói parse datetime (Precise Time): $e cho ti·∫øt kh√≠ ${term['name']} nƒÉm $year");
          continue;
        }
      }
    }

    final prevYearData = solarTermsByYear[year - 1];
    if (prevYearData != null && prevYearData.isNotEmpty) {
      final lastTermPrevYear = prevYearData.last;
      try {
        final DateTime startTimePrevYear =
            DateTime.parse(lastTermPrevYear["startTimeLocal"]).toLocal();
        final String? firstTermStartTimeStr =
            yearData?.first?['startTimeLocal'];
        DateTime? effectiveEndTime = firstTermStartTimeStr != null
            ? DateTime.parse(firstTermStartTimeStr).toLocal()
            : null;

        if (!targetDateTimeLocal.isBefore(startTimePrevYear) &&
            (effectiveEndTime == null ||
                targetDateTimeLocal.isBefore(effectiveEndTime))) {
          return lastTermPrevYear;
        }
      } catch (e) {
        print("L·ªói parse datetime cu·ªëi nƒÉm tr∆∞·ªõc (Precise Time fallback): $e");
      }
    }

    LoggerUtils.error(
        "SolarTermsConstants: Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ x√°c ƒë·ªãnh Ti·∫øt Kh√≠ cho th·ªùi ƒëi·ªÉm ${targetDateTimeLocal.toIso8601String()}");
    return null;
  }

  /// [D√ôNG ƒê·ªÇ T√çNH TR·ª∞C] T√¨m ti·∫øt kh√≠ c√≥ ng√†y b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu <= ng√†y target.
  static Map<String, dynamic>? getSolarTermForDayCalculation(
      DateTime targetDateTime) {
    final targetDateTimeLocal = targetDateTime.toLocal();
    final targetDateOnly = DateTime(targetDateTimeLocal.year,
        targetDateTimeLocal.month, targetDateTimeLocal.day);
    Map<String, dynamic>? effectiveTerm;
    final year = targetDateOnly.year;

    final yearData = solarTermsByYear[year];
    if (yearData != null) {
      for (final term in yearData) {
        try {
          final DateTime startTime =
              DateTime.parse(term["startTimeLocal"]).toLocal();
          final startDateOnly =
              DateTime(startTime.year, startTime.month, startTime.day);

          if (startDateOnly.isAtSameMomentAs(targetDateOnly) ||
              startDateOnly.isBefore(targetDateOnly)) {
            effectiveTerm = term;
          } else {
            break;
          }
        } catch (e) {
          print(
              "L·ªói parse datetime (Date-Based Logic): $e cho ti·∫øt kh√≠ ${term['name']} nƒÉm $year");
          continue;
        }
      }
    }

    if (effectiveTerm == null) {
      final prevYearData = solarTermsByYear[year - 1];
      if (prevYearData != null && prevYearData.isNotEmpty) {
        final lastTermPrevYear = prevYearData.last;
        try {
          final DateTime startTimePrevYear =
              DateTime.parse(lastTermPrevYear["startTimeLocal"]).toLocal();
          final startDateOnlyPrevYear = DateTime(startTimePrevYear.year,
              startTimePrevYear.month, startTimePrevYear.day);
          if (startDateOnlyPrevYear.isAtSameMomentAs(targetDateOnly) ||
              startDateOnlyPrevYear.isBefore(targetDateOnly)) {
            effectiveTerm = lastTermPrevYear;
          }
        } catch (e) {
          print(
              "L·ªói parse datetime cu·ªëi nƒÉm tr∆∞·ªõc (Date-Based Logic fallback): $e");
        }
      }
    }

    if (effectiveTerm == null) {
      LoggerUtils.error(
          "SolarTermsConstants: Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ x√°c ƒë·ªãnh Ti·∫øt Kh√≠ cho t√≠nh to√°n ng√†y ${dateFormat.format(targetDateOnly)}");
    }
    return effectiveTerm;
  }

  static final DateFormat dateFormat = DateFormat('dd/MM/yyyy');
}
```

```dart
// File: huong_hop_menh_service.dart

import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/modules/detail/services/constants/huong_hop_menh_constant.dart';
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/utils/logger_utils.dart'; // Cho logging

class HuongHopMenhService {
  /// B∆∞·ªõc 2: T√≠nh T·ªïng s·ªë t·ª´ nƒÉm sinh
  static int _calculateTongSo(int birthYear) {
    if (birthYear < 1000 || birthYear > DateTime.now().year) {
      // X·ª≠ l√Ω nƒÉm sinh kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá, c√≥ th·ªÉ throw exception ho·∫∑c tr·∫£ v·ªÅ gi√° tr·ªã m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh
      LoggerUtils.warning("NƒÉm sinh kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá: $birthYear");
      return -1; // Ho·∫∑c m·ªôt gi√° tr·ªã b√°o l·ªói
    }
    String yearStr = birthYear.toString();
    int lastTwoDigitsSum = int.parse(yearStr[yearStr.length - 2]) +
        int.parse(yearStr[yearStr.length - 1]);

    // Ti·∫øp t·ª•c c·ªông n·∫øu k·∫øt qu·∫£ l√† 2 ch·ªØ s·ªë
    while (lastTwoDigitsSum >= 10) {
      String sumStr = lastTwoDigitsSum.toString();
      lastTwoDigitsSum = int.parse(sumStr[0]) + int.parse(sumStr[1]);
    }
    return lastTwoDigitsSum;
  }

  /// B∆∞·ªõc 2: X√°c ƒë·ªãnh Qu√°i s·ªë theo gi·ªõi t√≠nh, nƒÉm sinh v√† T·ªïng s·ªë
  static int _calculateQuaiSo(int tongSo, String gender, int birthYear) {
    if (tongSo == -1) return -1; // L·ªói t·ª´ b∆∞·ªõc tr∆∞·ªõc

    int quaiSo;
    if (gender.toLowerCase() == 'male' || gender.toLowerCase() == 'nam') {
      quaiSo = birthYear >= 2000 ? 9 - tongSo : 10 - tongSo;
    } else if (gender.toLowerCase() == 'female' ||
        gender.toLowerCase() == 'nu' ||
        gender.toLowerCase() == 'n·ªØ') {
      quaiSo = birthYear >= 2000 ? 6 + tongSo : 5 + tongSo;
    } else {
      LoggerUtils.warning("Gi·ªõi t√≠nh kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá: $gender");
      return -1; // L·ªói gi·ªõi t√≠nh
    }

    if (quaiSo > 9) {
      // N·∫øu l·ªõn h∆°n 9, r√∫t g·ªçn b·∫±ng c√°ch c·ªông c√°c ch·ªØ s·ªë
      while (quaiSo > 9) {
        String quaiSoStr = quaiSo.toString();
        quaiSo = int.parse(quaiSoStr[0]) + int.parse(quaiSoStr[1]);
      }
    }

    return quaiSo == 0 ? 9 : quaiSo; // N·∫øu ra 0 th√¨ l√† 9
    // Qu√°i s·ªë trong b·∫£ng t·ª´ 1-9.
  }

  /// B∆∞·ªõc 3: Tra b·∫£ng Qu√°i s·ªë ƒë·ªÉ x√°c ƒë·ªãnh M·ªánh Tr·∫°ch & Nh√≥m
  /// Tr·∫£ v·ªÅ m·ªôt Map v√≠ d·ª•: {'menhTrach': 'Kh·∫£m', 'nhom': 'ƒê√¥ng T·ª© M·ªánh'}
  static Map<String, String>? getMenhTrachNhom(int quaiSo, String gender) {
    if (quaiSo < 1 || quaiSo > 9) {
      LoggerUtils.warning("Qu√°i s·ªë kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá: $quaiSo");
      return null;
    }

    if (quaiSo == 5) {
      if (gender.toLowerCase() == 'male' || gender.toLowerCase() == 'nam') {
        return {
          'menhTrach':
              HuongHopMenhConstant.quaiSoToMenhTrach[5]!['menhTrach_Nam']!,
          'nhom': HuongHopMenhConstant.quaiSoToMenhTrach[5]!['nhom_Nam']!
        };
      } else {
        // female
        return {
          'menhTrach':
              HuongHopMenhConstant.quaiSoToMenhTrach[5]!['menhTrach_Nu']!,
          'nhom': HuongHopMenhConstant.quaiSoToMenhTrach[5]!['nhom_Nu']!
        };
      }
    }

    return HuongHopMenhConstant.quaiSoToMenhTrach[quaiSo];
  }

  /// H√†m ch√≠nh: T√≠nh h∆∞·ªõng h·ª£p m·ªánh
  /// Tr·∫£ v·ªÅ Map {'name': 'T√™n Nh√≥m M·ªánh', 'detail': 'Danh s√°ch h∆∞·ªõng h·ª£p'}
  /// ho·∫∑c null n·∫øu c√≥ l·ªói.
  static Map<String, String>? tinhHuongHopMenh(
      {required DateTime birthDate, required String gender}) {
    try {
      final int birthYear = birthDate.year;

      // B∆∞·ªõc 1 & 2: T√≠nh Qu√°i s·ªë
      final int tongSo = _calculateTongSo(birthYear);
      if (tongSo == -1) return null; // L·ªói nƒÉm sinh

      final int quaiSo = _calculateQuaiSo(tongSo, gender, birthYear);
      if (quaiSo == -1) return null; // L·ªói gi·ªõi t√≠nh

      // B∆∞·ªõc 3: X√°c ƒë·ªãnh M·ªánh Tr·∫°ch & Nh√≥m
      final Map<String, String>? menhTrachInfo =
          getMenhTrachNhom(quaiSo, gender);
      if (menhTrachInfo == null || !menhTrachInfo.containsKey('nhom')) {
        LoggerUtils.warning(
            "Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ x√°c ƒë·ªãnh M·ªánh Tr·∫°ch ho·∫∑c Nh√≥m cho Qu√°i s·ªë: $quaiSo, Gi·ªõi t√≠nh: $gender");
        return null;
      }

      final String nhomMenh = menhTrachInfo['nhom']!;
      final String menhTrach =
          menhTrachInfo['menhTrach']!; // L·∫•y th√™m M·ªánh Tr·∫°ch

      final List<String>? huongHopListOriginal =
          HuongHopMenhConstant.huongHopTheoNhom[nhomMenh];

      if (huongHopListOriginal == null || huongHopListOriginal.isEmpty) {
        LoggerUtils.warning(
            "Kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y h∆∞·ªõng h·ª£p cho Nh√≥m M·ªánh: $nhomMenh");
        return null;
      }

      // **X·ª¨ L√ù LO·∫†I B·ªé PH·∫¶N TRONG NGO·∫∂C CHO H∆Ø·ªöNG**
      final List<String> huongHopListCleaned =
          huongHopListOriginal.map((huong) {
        // T√¨m v·ªã tr√≠ c·ªßa d·∫•u m·ªü ngo·∫∑c ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n
        int indexOfParenthesis = huong.indexOf('(');
        if (indexOfParenthesis != -1) {
          // N·∫øu t√¨m th·∫•y, ch·ªâ l·∫•y ph·∫ßn tr∆∞·ªõc d·∫•u m·ªü ngo·∫∑c v√† trim kho·∫£ng tr·∫Øng
          return huong.substring(0, indexOfParenthesis).trim();
        }
        // N·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ d·∫•u ngo·∫∑c, tr·∫£ v·ªÅ chu·ªói g·ªëc
        return huong;
      }).toList();

      return {
        'nhomMenh': nhomMenh, // T√™n nh√≥m m·ªánh (ƒê√¥ng T·ª© M·ªánh / T√¢y T·ª© M·ªánh)
        'menhTrach': menhTrach, // T√™n M·ªánh Tr·∫°ch (Kh·∫£m, Ly, C·∫•n,...)
        'quaiSo': quaiSo.toString(), // Qu√°i s·ªë ƒë√£ t√≠nh
        'detail': huongHopListCleaned.join(', '),
      };
    } catch (e, s) {
      LoggerUtils.error("L·ªói khi t√≠nh h∆∞·ªõng h·ª£p m·ªánh", e, s);
      return null;
    }
  }
}
```

### mini_services/ly_thuan_phong_service.dart

```dart
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/modules/detail/services/constants/time_constants.dart';
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/modules/detail/services/lunar_service.dart';
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/utils/logger_utils.dart';
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
// Import collection ƒë·ªÉ d√πng groupBy (ho·∫∑c t·ª± implement n·∫øu kh√¥ng mu·ªën th√™m dependency)
import 'package:collection/collection.dart';

extension LyThuanPhongServiceExtension on LunarService {
  // --- getLyThuanPhongHours v√† c√°c h√†m helper gi·ªØ nguy√™n nh∆∞ l·∫ßn s·ª≠a tr∆∞·ªõc ---
  static List<Map<String, dynamic>> getLyThuanPhongHours(DateTime date) {
    // ... (Code t·ª´ l·∫ßn s·ª≠a tr∆∞·ªõc - kh√¥ng ƒë·ªïi) ...
    try {
      final lunarDate = LunarService.getSolarToLunar(date.toLocal());
      final lunarDay = lunarDate.day;
      final lunarMonth = lunarDate.month;

      final result = <Map<String, dynamic>>[];
      final hourInfoList = _get12HourInfo(); // L·∫•y th√¥ng tin 12 gi·ªù

      for (final hourInfo in hourInfoList) {
        final hourKey = hourInfo['hour'] as String; // vd: 't√Ω'
        final khacIndex = TimeConstant.khacDinhDi[hourKey];

        if (khacIndex == null) {
          LoggerUtils.warning(
              'L√Ω Thu·∫ßn Phong: Kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y Kh·∫Øc ƒë·ªãnh ƒëi cho gi·ªù "$hourKey"');
          continue; // B·ªè qua n·∫øu kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y gi·ªù
        }

        // √Åp d·ª•ng c√¥ng th·ª©c
        final int calculationResult = (lunarDay + lunarMonth + khacIndex) - 2;
        final int remainder = calculationResult % 6;

        // L·∫•y key t√™n lo·∫°i gi·ªù t·ª´ s·ªë d∆∞
        final String? hourTypeName =
            TimeConstant.lyThuanPhongHourTypes[remainder];
        if (hourTypeName == null) {
          LoggerUtils.warning(
              'L√Ω Thu·∫ßn Phong: Kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y lo·∫°i gi·ªù cho s·ªë d∆∞ $remainder');
          continue; // B·ªè qua n·∫øu kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y lo·∫°i gi·ªù
        }

        // L·∫•y th√¥ng tin chi ti·∫øt c·ªßa lo·∫°i gi·ªù
        final Map<String, dynamic>? typeData =
            TimeConstant.lyThuanPhongData[hourTypeName];
        if (typeData == null) {
          LoggerUtils.warning(
              'L√Ω Thu·∫ßn Phong: Kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y chi ti·∫øt cho lo·∫°i gi·ªù "$hourTypeName"');
          continue; // B·ªè qua n·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ d·ªØ li·ªáu chi ti·∫øt
        }

        // Th√™m v√†o k·∫øt qu·∫£
        result.add({
          ...hourInfo, // Th√™m th√¥ng tin c∆° b·∫£n c·ªßa gi·ªù ('hour', 'chi', 'timeRange', 'pair')
          'name': typeData['name'],
          'rating': typeData['rating'],
          'description': typeData['description'],
          'advice': typeData['advice'],
          'color': typeData['color'],
          'colorValue': _getColorFromName(typeData['color']), // Chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi m√†u
          'icon': typeData['icon'],
        });
      }

      return result;
    } catch (e, stackTrace) {
      LoggerUtils.error('L·ªói khi t√≠nh gi·ªù L√Ω Thu·∫ßn Phong', e, stackTrace);
      return []; // Tr·∫£ v·ªÅ danh s√°ch r·ªóng n·∫øu c√≥ l·ªói
    }
  }

  static List<Map<String, dynamic>> _get12HourInfo() {
    return TimeConstant.lyThuanPhongHours.entries.map((entry) {
      final String chiValue =
          entry.value['chi'] as String? ?? 'N/A'; // L·∫•y gi√° tr·ªã t·ª´ key 'chi'
      return {
        'hour': entry.key,
        'chiHour': chiValue, // G√°n v√†o key 'chiHour' ƒë·ªÉ UI s·ª≠ d·ª•ng
        'timeRange': entry.value['timeRange'],
        'pair': entry.value['pair'],
      };
    }).toList();
  }

  static Color _getColorFromName(String colorName) {
    // ... (Code t·ª´ l·∫ßn s·ª≠a tr∆∞·ªõc - kh√¥ng ƒë·ªïi) ...
    switch (colorName) {
      case 'green':
        return Colors.green.shade700; // M√†u ƒë·∫≠m h∆°n
      case 'lightGreen':
        return Colors.lightGreen.shade600;
      case 'red':
        return Colors.red.shade700; // M√†u ƒë·∫≠m h∆°n
      case 'orange':
        return Colors.orange.shade700;
      case 'amber':
        return Colors.amber.shade700;
      default:
        return Colors.grey; // M√†u m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh
    }
  }

  // --- H√†m M·ªöI: Nh√≥m gi·ªù theo ƒë√°nh gi√° V√Ä theo t√™n ---
  /// Nh√≥m c√°c gi·ªù theo ƒë√°nh gi√° (good/bad/neutral) V√Ä theo t√™n lo·∫°i gi·ªù (ƒê·∫°i An, T·ªëc H·ª∑,...)
  static Map<String, Map<String, List<Map<String, dynamic>>>>
      groupAndCombineHours(DateTime date) {
    final allHours = getLyThuanPhongHours(date);
    final result = <String, Map<String, List<Map<String, dynamic>>>>{
      'good': {},
      'neutral': {},
      'bad': {},
    };

    // Ph√¢n lo·∫°i ban ƒë·∫ßu theo good/bad/neutral
    final groupedByRating = <String, List<Map<String, dynamic>>>{
      'good': [],
      'neutral': [],
      'bad': [],
    };
    for (final hour in allHours) {
      final rating = hour['rating'] as String;
      if (rating == 'R·∫•t t·ªët' || rating == 'T·ªët' || rating == 'T·ªët v·ª´a') {
        groupedByRating['good']!.add(hour);
      } else if (rating == 'X·∫•u' ||
          rating == 'R·∫•t x·∫•u' ||
          rating == 'X·∫•u v·ª´a') {
        groupedByRating['bad']!.add(hour);
      } else {
        groupedByRating['neutral']!.add(hour);
      }
    }

    // Nh√≥m con theo t√™n trong t·ª´ng lo·∫°i rating v√† s·∫Øp x·∫øp gi·ªù t·ªët/x·∫•u
    groupedByRating.forEach((ratingKey, hoursInRating) {
      // S·ª≠ d·ª•ng groupBy t·ª´ package:collection
      final groupedByName =
          groupBy(hoursInRating, (hour) => hour['name'] as String);

      // S·∫Øp x·∫øp c√°c lo·∫°i gi·ªù trong nh√≥m T·ªët
      if (ratingKey == 'good') {
        final sortedKeys = groupedByName.keys.toList()
          ..sort((a, b) {
            const order = {'ƒê·∫°i An': 1, 'T·ªëc H·ª∑': 2, 'Ti·ªÉu C√°t': 3};
            return (order[a] ?? 4).compareTo(order[b] ?? 4);
          });
        // T·∫°o map m·ªõi ƒë√£ s·∫Øp x·∫øp
        final sortedGroup = <String, List<Map<String, dynamic>>>{};
        for (final key in sortedKeys) {
          sortedGroup[key] = groupedByName[key]!;
        }
        result[ratingKey] = sortedGroup;
      }
      // S·∫Øp x·∫øp c√°c lo·∫°i gi·ªù trong nh√≥m X·∫•u
      else if (ratingKey == 'bad') {
        final sortedKeys = groupedByName.keys.toList()
          ..sort((a, b) {
            const order = {'Kh√¥ng Vong': 1, 'X√≠ch Kh·∫©u': 2, 'L∆∞u Ni√™n': 3};
            return (order[a] ?? 4).compareTo(order[b] ?? 4);
          });
        // T·∫°o map m·ªõi ƒë√£ s·∫Øp x·∫øp
        final sortedGroup = <String, List<Map<String, dynamic>>>{};
        for (final key in sortedKeys) {
          sortedGroup[key] = groupedByName[key]!;
        }
        result[ratingKey] = sortedGroup;
      } else {
        result[ratingKey] = groupedByName; // Gi·ªØ nguy√™n th·ª© t·ª± cho neutral
      }
    });

    return result;
  }
}
```

```dart
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/modules/detail/services/constants/ngoc_hap_constant.dart';
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/modules/detail/services/lunar_service.dart';
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/app/utils/logger_utils.dart';

// M·ªü r·ªông LunarService ƒë·ªÉ th√™m c√°c ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c Ng·ªçc H·∫°p
extension NgocHapServiceExtension on LunarService {
  // L·∫•y th√¥ng tin sao t·ªët t·ª´ Ng·ªçc H·∫°p
  static List<Map<String, String>> getCatTinh(DateTime date) {
    try {
      final lunarDate = LunarService.getSolarToLunar(date);
      final canChiDay = LunarService.getCanChiDay(date);
      final parts = canChiDay.split(' ');
      if (parts.length != 2) throw Exception('Invalid Can-Chi format');

      final can = parts[0]; // Thi√™n Can
      final chi = parts[1]; // ƒê·ªãa Chi
      final month = lunarDate.month;
      final result = <Map<String, String>>[];

      LoggerUtils.debug(
          'Processing Cat Tinh - Date: $date, Can: $can, Chi: $chi, Month: $month');

      // Ki·ªÉm tra sao theo Can
      if (NgocHapConstants.catTinhData.containsKey(month) &&
          NgocHapConstants.catTinhData[month]!.containsKey("can")) {
        NgocHapConstants.catTinhData[month]!["can"]!.forEach((matchCan, stars) {
          final matchCanList = matchCan.split(',').map((e) => e.trim()).toSet();
          if (matchCanList.contains(can)) {
            for (final star in stars) {
              if (NgocHapConstants.catTinhDescription.containsKey(star)) {
                result.add({
                  'name': star,
                  'description': NgocHapConstants.catTinhDescription[star]!,
                  'icon': "‚Ä¢",
                  // 'icon': NgocHapConstants.starEmojis[star] ?? '‚ú®'
                });
              }
            }
          }
        });
      }

      // Ki·ªÉm tra sao theo Chi
      if (NgocHapConstants.catTinhData.containsKey(month) &&
          NgocHapConstants.catTinhData[month]!.containsKey("chi")) {
        NgocHapConstants.catTinhData[month]!["chi"]!.forEach((matchChi, stars) {
          final matchChiList = matchChi.split(',').map((e) => e.trim()).toSet();
          if (matchChiList.contains(chi)) {
            for (final star in stars) {
              if (!result.any((item) => item['name'] == star) &&
                  NgocHapConstants.catTinhDescription.containsKey(star)) {
                result.add({
                  'name': star,
                  'description': NgocHapConstants.catTinhDescription[star]!,
                  'icon': "‚Ä¢",
                  // 'icon': NgocHapConstants.starEmojis[star] ?? '‚ú®'
                });
              }
            }
          }
        });
      }

      // Ki·ªÉm tra sao theo Can Chi k·∫øt h·ª£p
      if (NgocHapConstants.catTinhData.containsKey(month) &&
          NgocHapConstants.catTinhData[month]!.containsKey("can_chi")) {
        final canChiMap = NgocHapConstants.catTinhData[month]!["can_chi"]!;
        final combinedCanChi =
            "$can $chi"; // T·∫°o key "Can Chi" t·ª´ ng√†y hi·ªán t·∫°i

        // Ki·ªÉm tra xem ng√†y Can Chi hi·ªán t·∫°i c√≥ trong map can_chi kh√¥ng
        if (canChiMap.containsKey(combinedCanChi)) {
          final stars = canChiMap[combinedCanChi]!; // L·∫•y danh s√°ch sao
          for (final star in stars) {
            // Th√™m sao n·∫øu ch∆∞a c√≥ v√† c√≥ m√¥ t·∫£
            if (!result.any((item) => item['name'] == star) &&
                NgocHapConstants.catTinhDescription.containsKey(star)) {
              // S·ª≠ d·ª•ng catTinhDescription
              result.add({
                'name': star,
                'description': NgocHapConstants
                    .catTinhDescription[star]!, // S·ª≠ d·ª•ng catTinhDescription
                'icon': "‚Ä¢",
                // 'icon': NgocHapConstants.starEmojis[star] ?? '‚ú®'
              });
            }
          }
        }
      }
      if (result.isEmpty) {
        LoggerUtils.debug(
            'No Cat Tinh stars found for date: $date, month: $month, can: $can, chi: $chi');
      }

      return result;
    } catch (e) {
      LoggerUtils.error('Error getting cat tinh: $e');
      return [];
    }
  }

  // L·∫•y th√¥ng tin sao x·∫•u t·ª´ Ng·ªçc H·∫°p
  static List<Map<String, String>> getHungSat(DateTime date) {
    try {
      final lunarDate = LunarService.getSolarToLunar(date);
      final canChiDay = LunarService.getCanChiDay(date);
      final parts = canChiDay.split(' ');
      if (parts.length != 2) throw Exception('Invalid Can-Chi format');

      final can = parts[0]; // Thi√™n Can
      final chi = parts[1]; // ƒê·ªãa Chi
      final month = lunarDate.month;
      final result = <Map<String, String>>[];

      LoggerUtils.debug(
          'Processing Hung Sat - Date: $date, Can: $can, Chi: $chi, Month: $month');

      // Ki·ªÉm tra sao theo Can
      if (NgocHapConstants.hungSatData.containsKey(month) &&
          NgocHapConstants.hungSatData[month]!.containsKey("can")) {
        NgocHapConstants.hungSatData[month]!["can"]!.forEach((matchCan, stars) {
          final matchCanList = matchCan.split(',').map((e) => e.trim()).toSet();
          if (matchCanList.contains(can)) {
            for (final star in stars) {
              if (NgocHapConstants.hungSatDescription.containsKey(star)) {
                result.add({
                  'name': star,
                  'description': NgocHapConstants.hungSatDescription[star]!,
                  'icon': "‚Ä¢",
                  // 'icon': NgocHapConstants.starEmojis[star] ?? '‚ö†Ô∏è'
                });
              }
            }
          }
        });
      }

      // Ki·ªÉm tra sao theo Chi
      if (NgocHapConstants.hungSatData.containsKey(month) &&
          NgocHapConstants.hungSatData[month]!.containsKey("chi")) {
        NgocHapConstants.hungSatData[month]!["chi"]!.forEach((matchChi, stars) {
          final matchChiList = matchChi.split(',').map((e) => e.trim()).toSet();
          if (matchChiList.contains(chi)) {
            for (final star in stars) {
              if (!result.any((item) => item['name'] == star) &&
                  NgocHapConstants.hungSatDescription.containsKey(star)) {
                result.add({
                  'name': star,
                  'description': NgocHapConstants.hungSatDescription[star]!,
                  'icon': "‚Ä¢",
                  // 'icon': NgocHapConstants.starEmojis[star] ?? '‚ö†Ô∏è'
                });
              }
            }
          }
        });
      }

      // Ki·ªÉm tra sao theo Can Chi k·∫øt h·ª£p
      if (NgocHapConstants.hungSatData.containsKey(month) &&
          NgocHapConstants.hungSatData[month]!.containsKey("can_chi")) {
        final canChiMap = NgocHapConstants.hungSatData[month]!["can_chi"]!;
        final combinedCanChi =
            "$can $chi"; // T·∫°o key "Can Chi" t·ª´ ng√†y hi·ªán t·∫°i

        // Ki·ªÉm tra xem ng√†y Can Chi hi·ªán t·∫°i c√≥ trong map can_chi kh√¥ng
        if (canChiMap.containsKey(combinedCanChi)) {
          final stars = canChiMap[combinedCanChi]!; // L·∫•y danh s√°ch sao
          for (final star in stars) {
            // Th√™m sao n·∫øu ch∆∞a c√≥ v√† c√≥ m√¥ t·∫£
            if (!result.any((item) => item['name'] == star) &&
                NgocHapConstants.hungSatDescription.containsKey(star)) {
              // S·ª≠ d·ª•ng hungSatDescription
              result.add({
                'name': star,
                'description': NgocHapConstants
                    .hungSatDescription[star]!, // S·ª≠ d·ª•ng hungSatDescription
                'icon': "‚Ä¢",
                // 'icon': NgocHapConstants.starEmojis[star] ?? '‚ö†Ô∏è'
              });
            }
          }
        }
      }

      if (result.isEmpty) {
        LoggerUtils.debug(
            'No Hung Sat stars found for date: $date, month: $month, can: $can, chi: $chi');
      }

      return result;
    } catch (e) {
      LoggerUtils.error('Error getting hung sat: $e');
      return [];
    }
  }

  // Ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c ƒë·ªãnh d·∫°ng k·∫øt qu·∫£ sang chu·ªói ƒë·ªÉ hi·ªÉn th·ªã
  static String formatNgocHapResult(DateTime date) {
    final catTinh = getCatTinh(date);
    final hungSat = getHungSat(date);

    final buffer = StringBuffer("**Ng·ªçc H·∫°p Th√¥ng Th∆∞**\n");

    if (catTinh.isNotEmpty) {
      buffer.writeln("**Sao t·ªët (${catTinh.length}):**");
      for (var star in catTinh) {
        buffer.writeln(
            "- ${star['icon']} ${star['name']}: ${star['description']}");
      }
    } else {
      buffer.writeln("**Sao t·ªët:** Kh√¥ng c√≥");
    }

    buffer.writeln("");

    if (hungSat.isNotEmpty) {
      buffer.writeln("**Sao x·∫•u (${hungSat.length}):**");
      for (var star in hungSat) {
        buffer.writeln(
            "- ${star['icon']} ${star['name']}: ${star['description']}");
      }
    } else {
      buffer.writeln("**Sao x·∫•u:** Kh√¥ng c√≥");
    }

    return buffer.toString();
  }
}
```

```dart
      const List<String> emptyGoodStrings = [

  /// Tr√≠ch xu·∫•t h∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n t√≠ch c·ª±c t·ª´ m√¥ t·∫£ sao
  static String _extractPositiveGuidance(String description) {
    // ∆Øu ti√™n t√¨m c√°c c·ª•m t·ª´ ch·ªâ vi·ªác n√™n l√†m c·ª• th·ªÉ
    if (description.contains("t·ªët cho") ||
        description.contains("n√™n l√†m") ||
        description.contains("th√≠ch h·ª£p cho")) {
      final patterns = ["t·ªët cho", "n√™n l√†m", "th√≠ch h·ª£p cho"];
      for (var pattern in patterns) {
        final parts = description.toLowerCase().split(pattern);
        if (parts.length > 1) {
          String guidance = parts[1].trim();
          // L·∫•y ph·∫ßn ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n cho ƒë·∫øn d·∫•u ch·∫•m ho·∫∑c h·∫øt chu·ªói
          final endIndex = guidance.indexOf('.');
          if (endIndex != -1) {
            guidance = guidance.substring(0, endIndex + 1);
          }
          // Vi·∫øt hoa ch·ªØ c√°i ƒë·∫ßu
          if (guidance.isNotEmpty) {
            guidance = guidance[0].toUpperCase() + guidance.substring(1);
            return "${pattern[0].toUpperCase()}${pattern.substring(1)} $guidance"; // V√≠ d·ª•: "T·ªët cho Vi·ªác A."
          }
        }
      }
    }
    // Fallback n·∫øu kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y c·∫•u tr√∫c c·ª• th·ªÉ
    if (description.toLowerCase().startsWith("t·ªët") ||
        description.toLowerCase().contains("c√°t l·ª£i")) {
      // C·ªë g·∫Øng l·∫•y c√¢u ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n n·∫øu c√≥ d·∫•u ch·∫•m
      final endIndex = description.indexOf('.');
      if (endIndex != -1) {
        return description.substring(0, endIndex + 1).trim();
      }
      return description.trim(); // Tr·∫£ v·ªÅ to√†n b·ªô m√¥ t·∫£ n·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ d·∫•u ch·∫•m
    }
    return "Kh√¥ng c√≥ h∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n c·ª• th·ªÉ cho vi·ªác n√™n l√†m."; // Ho·∫∑c tr·∫£ v·ªÅ "" n·∫øu mu·ªën ·∫©n ho√†n to√†n
  }

  /// Tr√≠ch xu·∫•t h∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n ti√™u c·ª±c t·ª´ m√¥ t·∫£ sao
  static String _extractNegativeGuidance(String description) {
    // ∆Øu ti√™n t√¨m c√°c c·ª•m t·ª´ ch·ªâ vi·ªác kh√¥ng n√™n l√†m
    final patterns = [
      "kh√¥ng n√™n",
      "tr√°nh",
      "k·ªµ",
      "x·∫•u cho",
      "kh√¥ng th√≠ch h·ª£p cho"
    ];
    for (var pattern in patterns) {
      final lowerDesc = description.toLowerCase();
      if (lowerDesc.contains(pattern)) {
        final parts = lowerDesc.split(pattern);
        if (parts.length > 1) {
          String guidance = parts[1].trim();
          final endIndex = guidance.indexOf('.');
          if (endIndex != -1) {
            guidance = guidance.substring(0, endIndex + 1);
          }
          if (guidance.isNotEmpty) {
            guidance = guidance[0].toUpperCase() + guidance.substring(1);
            // Vi·∫øt hoa ch·ªØ c√°i ƒë·∫ßu c·ªßa pattern
            final capitalizedPattern =
                pattern[0].toUpperCase() + pattern.substring(1);
            return "$capitalizedPattern $guidance"; // V√≠ d·ª•: "Kh√¥ng n√™n Vi·ªác B."
          }
        }
      }
    }
    // N·∫øu kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y c·∫•u tr√∫c c·ª• th·ªÉ, tr·∫£ v·ªÅ chu·ªói r·ªóng ƒë·ªÉ ·∫©n
    return "";
  }

  // TH·∫¨P NH·ªä KI·∫æN TR·ª™ - SECTION

  /// L·∫•y th√¥ng tin chi ti·∫øt v·ªÅ Th·∫≠p Nh·ªã Ki·∫øn Tr·ª´ (12 tr·ª±c)
  static Map<String, dynamic> getDetailedTrucInfo(DateTime date) {
    try {
      final trucName = LunarService.getTruc(date);
      final info = TimeConstant.trucInfo[trucName]; // L·∫•y t·ª´ Map m·ªõi

      if (info == null) throw Exception('Truc info not found for $trucName');

      String trucIcon = TimeConstant.trucIcons[trucName.toLowerCase()] ?? "üìÖ";

      return {
        'name': trucName,
        'description': info['description'] ?? 'Kh√¥ng c√≥ m√¥ t·∫£.',
        'isCat': info['isCat'] ?? false, // V·∫´n gi·ªØ isCat n·∫øu c·∫ßn
        'type':
            info['rating'] ?? 'Kh√¥ng x√°c ƒë·ªãnh', // D√πng rating l√†m type ch√≠nh
        'rating':
            info['rating'] ?? 'Kh√¥ng x√°c ƒë·ªãnh', // Th√™m tr∆∞·ªùng rating r√µ r√†ng
        'icon': trucIcon,
        'guidance': {
          // Gi·ªØ c·∫•u tr√∫c guidance n·∫øu View ƒëang d√πng
          'good': info['good'] ?? 'Kh√¥ng r√µ',
          'bad': info['bad'] ?? 'Kh√¥ng r√µ',
        },
        'solution': info['solution'] ?? '', // Th√™m tr∆∞·ªùng sao gi·∫£i
      };
    } catch (e) {

      return {
        'name': 'Kh√¥ng x√°c ƒë·ªãnh',
        'description': 'Kh√¥ng c√≥ th√¥ng tin chi ti·∫øt.',
        'isCat': false,

        'rating': 'Kh√¥ng x√°c ƒë·ªãnh',
        'icon': 'üìÖ',
        'guidance': {'good': 'L·ªói', 'bad': 'L·ªói'},
        'solution': '',
      };
    }
  }
}
```

```dart
            "NƒÉm xem ($lunarTargetYear) nh·ªè h∆°n nƒÉm sinh ($lunarBirthYear)");

      if (lunarAge <= 0) {

      final int remainder = lunarAge % 9;

      String description = "Tu·ªïi $lunarAge (m·ª•) - Kh√¥ng ph·∫°m Kim L√¢u";
      bool isPham = false;

      switch (remainder) {

              "Tu·ªïi $lunarAge (m·ª•) - Ph·∫°m Kim L√¢u Th√¢n (H·∫°i b·∫£n th√¢n)";

          isPham = true;

          isPham = true;

    } catch (e, s) {

      return KimLauResult(

  // T√≠nh Hoang ·ªêc
  static HoangOcResult checkHoangOc(DateTime birthDate, DateTime targetDate) {
    try {
      final int lunarAge = _calculateLunarAge(birthDate, targetDate);
      if (lunarAge <= 0) {
        return HoangOcResult(

      final int tensDigit = lunarAge ~/ 10;

      final Map<String, dynamic>? resultData = _hoangOcData[index0based];

      return HoangOcResult(

        meaning: resultData['meaning'] as String,

      return HoangOcResult(

  // T√≠nh Tam Tai
  static TamTaiResult checkTamTai(DateTime birthDate, DateTime targetDate) {
    try {
      final int birthYear =
          LunarService.getSolarToLunar(birthDate.toLocal()).year;
      final int targetYear =
          LunarService.getSolarToLunar(targetDate.toLocal()).year;

      if (birthYear <= 0 || targetYear <= 0) {
        return TamTaiResult(
            isTamTai: false,
            description: "NƒÉm kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá",
            birthAnimal: "N/A");

      // S·ª≠ d·ª•ng h√†m helper _getZodiacIndex v√† _getZodiacAnimal ƒë√£ ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a trong file n√†y
      final int birthZodiacIndex = _getZodiacIndex(birthYear);
      final int targetYearZodiacIndex = _getZodiacIndex(targetYear);

      if (birthZodiacIndex == -1 || targetYearZodiacIndex == -1) {
        return TamTaiResult(

            description: "Kh√¥ng x√°c ƒë·ªãnh ƒë∆∞·ª£c con gi√°p",

      final String birthAnimal = _getZodiacAnimal(birthYear);
      final String targetYearAnimal = _getZodiacAnimal(targetYear);

      final int? groupKey = _findTamHopGroupKey(birthZodiacIndex);
      if (groupKey == null) {

            description:
                "Kh√¥ng x√°c ƒë·ªãnh ƒë∆∞·ª£c nh√≥m Tam H·ª£p cho tu·ªïi $birthAnimal",
            birthAnimal: birthAnimal);

      final List<int>? targetTamTaiIndices = _tamTaiYearIndices[groupKey];
      if (targetTamTaiIndices == null) {
        return TamTaiResult(
            isTamTai: false,
            description: "L·ªói tra c·ª©u nƒÉm Tam Tai cho nh√≥m $groupKey",
            birthAnimal: birthAnimal);
      }

      final bool isTamTai = targetTamTaiIndices.contains(targetYearZodiacIndex);

      if (isTamTai) {
        final int yearOrder =
            targetTamTaiIndices.indexOf(targetYearZodiacIndex) + 1;
        final String meaning =
            _tamTaiYearMeanings[yearOrder] ?? "Kh√¥ng r√µ √Ω nghƒ©a.";

        return TamTaiResult(

          tamTaiYearOrder: yearOrder,
          currentYearAnimal: targetYearAnimal,
          description: "Tu·ªïi $birthAnimal g·∫∑p $meaning",
          birthAnimal: birthAnimal,
        );
      } else {
        return TamTaiResult(
          isTamTai: false,
          description:
              "Tu·ªïi $birthAnimal kh√¥ng ph·∫°m Tam Tai trong nƒÉm $targetYear ($targetYearAnimal)",
          birthAnimal: birthAnimal,

    } catch (e, s) {

      return TamTaiResult(

        description: "L·ªói t√≠nh Tam Tai.",

    }
  }
```

```dart
    'h·ªèa': [2, 7],
    'th·ªï': [0, 5], // H√† ƒë·ªì Th·ªï l√† 0, 5
  };

  /// T√≠nh to√°n m√†u may m·∫Øn d·ª±a tr√™n ng√†y sinh v√† ng√†y hi·ªán t·∫°i
  static List<Map<String, dynamic>> getLuckyColors(
      DateTime birthDate, DateTime selectedDate) {
    try {
      final birthYearInfo = _getHanhInfo(birthDate, true);
      final String userHanh =
          birthYearInfo['napAmHanh'].toString().toLowerCase();

      final List<Map<String, dynamic>> luckyColors = [];

      // 1. M√†u B·∫£n M·ªánh
      luckyColors.addAll(hanhToColors[userHanh] ?? []);

      // 2. M√†u T∆∞∆°ng Sinh (H√†nh sinh ra m√¨nh)
      String? sinhHanh;
      for (final relation in hanhRelationships['t∆∞∆°ng sinh']!) {
        final parts = relation.split('-');
        if (parts.length == 2 && parts[1] == userHanh) {
          sinhHanh = parts[0];
          break;
        }
      }
      if (sinhHanh != null) {
        luckyColors.addAll(hanhToColors[sinhHanh] ?? []);
      }

      // // 3. (T√πy ch·ªçn) B·ªè M√†u Sinh Xu·∫•t (H√†nh m√¨nh sinh ra) - Gi·ªØ l·∫°i n·∫øu b·∫°n mu·ªën nhi·ªÅu l·ª±a ch·ªçn h∆°n
      // String? xuatHanh;
      // for (final relation in hanhRelationships['t∆∞∆°ng sinh']!) {
      //   final parts = relation.split('-');
      //   if (parts.length == 2 && parts[0] == userHanh) {
      //     xuatHanh = parts[1];
      //     break;
      //   }
      // }
      // if (xuatHanh != null) {
      //   luckyColors.addAll(hanhToColors[xuatHanh] ?? []);
      // }

      // Lo·∫°i b·ªè tr√πng l·∫∑p (n·∫øu c√≥ do th√™m t·ª´ nhi·ªÅu ngu·ªìn)
      final uniqueColors = <Map<String, dynamic>>[];
      final seenNames = <String>{};
      for (final color in luckyColors) {
        if (seenNames.add(color['name'])) {
          // Ch·ªâ th√™m n·∫øu t√™n m√†u ch∆∞a c√≥
          uniqueColors.add(color);
        }
      }

      final seedValue = selectedDate.year * 10000 +
          selectedDate.month * 100 +
          selectedDate.day;
      final random = Random(seedValue);
      uniqueColors.shuffle(random);

      return uniqueColors.take(5).map((color) {
        return {
          'name': color['name'],
          'color': color['color'],
          'hex': color['hex'],
          'hanh': _findHanhByColor(color['name'])
        };
      }).toList();
    } catch (e) {
      LoggerUtils.error('LuckyElements: Error calculating lucky colors', e);
      return [
        {
          'name': 'Xanh L√°',
          'color': const Color(0xFF00A651),
          'hex': '#00A651',
          'hanh': 'M·ªôc'
        },
        {
          'name': 'V√†ng',
          'color': const Color(0xFFFFFF00),
          'hex': '#FFFF00',
          'hanh': 'Th·ªï'
        },
        {
          'name': 'Tr·∫Øng',
          'color': const Color(0xFFFFFFFF),
          'hex': '#FFFFFF',
          'hanh': 'Kim'
        },
      ];
    }
  }

  /// T√¨m ng≈© h√†nh t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng v·ªõi t√™n m√†u
  static String _findHanhByColor(String colorName) {
    for (final entry in hanhToColors.entries) {
      for (final color in entry.value) {
        if (color['name'] == colorName) {
          return entry.key == 'kim'
              ? 'Kim'
              : entry.key == 'm·ªôc'
                  ? 'M·ªôc'
                  : entry.key == 'th·ªßy'
                      ? 'Th·ªßy'
                      : entry.key == 'h·ªèa'
                          ? 'H·ªèa'
                          : 'Th·ªï';
        }
      }
    }
    return 'Kim';
  }

  /// T√≠nh 3 con s·ªë may m·∫Øn d·ª±a tr√™n ph∆∞∆°ng ph√°p ∆∞u ti√™n
  static List<int> getLuckyNumbers(UserData user, DateTime selectedDate) {
    if (user.birthDate == null) {
      LoggerUtils.warning("LuckyElements: Thi·∫øu ng√†y sinh ƒë·ªÉ t√≠nh s·ªë may m·∫Øn.");
      return [3, 7, 9];
    }

    try {
      final DateTime birthDate = user.birthDate!;
      final String gender = user.gender;
      final Set<int> prioritizedLuckyNumbers = {};

      // ∆Øu ti√™n 1: S·ªë theo H√†nh N·∫°p √Çm (H√† ƒê·ªì)
      final birthYearInfo = _getHanhInfo(birthDate, true);
      final String userHanh =
          birthYearInfo['napAmHanh'].toString().toLowerCase();
      prioritizedLuckyNumbers.addAll(hanhToLuckyNumbers[userHanh] ?? []);
      // LoggerUtils.debug("LuckyNumbers - H√† ƒê·ªì ($userHanh): ${hanhToLuckyNumbers[userHanh]} -> Set: $prioritizedLuckyNumbers");

      // ∆Øu ti√™n 2: S·ªë ƒê∆∞·ªùng ƒê·ªùi (Life Path)
      final int lifePath = _calculateLifePath(birthDate);
      prioritizedLuckyNumbers.add(lifePath);
      // LoggerUtils.debug("LuckyNumbers - Life Path: $lifePath -> Set: $prioritizedLuckyNumbers");

      // ∆Øu ti√™n 3: S·ªë Kua (C·∫ßn Gi·ªõi T√≠nh)
      final bool isMale = (gender.toLowerCase() == 'male');
      final int kuaNumber = _calculateKuaNumber(birthDate, isMale);
      prioritizedLuckyNumbers.add(kuaNumber);
      // LoggerUtils.debug("LuckyNumbers - Kua ($gender): $kuaNumber -> Set: $prioritizedLuckyNumbers");

      // ∆Øu ti√™n 4: S·ªë Can/Chi (N·∫øu ch∆∞a ƒë·ªß 3 s·ªë)
      if (prioritizedLuckyNumbers.length < 3) {
        final String dayCan =
            LunarService.getCanChiDay(selectedDate).split(' ')[0];
        int canNumber = TimeConstant.hangCan.indexOf(dayCan) + 1;
        canNumber = _reduceSingleDigit(canNumber);
        if (canNumber > 0) {
          prioritizedLuckyNumbers.add(canNumber);
          //  LoggerUtils.debug("LuckyNumbers - Can Ng√†y ($dayCan): $canNumber -> Set: $prioritizedLuckyNumbers");
        }
      }
      if (prioritizedLuckyNumbers.length < 3) {
        final String birthChi =
            LunarService.getCanChiYear(birthDate).split(' ')[1];
        int chiNumber = TimeConstant.hangChi.indexOf(birthChi) + 1;
        chiNumber = _reduceSingleDigit(chiNumber);
        if (chiNumber > 0) {
          prioritizedLuckyNumbers.add(chiNumber);
          //  LoggerUtils.debug("LuckyNumbers - Chi NƒÉm Sinh ($birthChi): $chiNumber -> Set: $prioritizedLuckyNumbers");
        }
      }

      // X·ª≠ l√Ω cu·ªëi c√πng
      List<int> result = prioritizedLuckyNumbers
          .where((num) => num >= 0 && num <= 9)
          .toList(); // Gi·ªØ l·∫°i s·ªë 0 t·ª´ H√† ƒê·ªì Th·ªï

      // B·ªï sung n·∫øu v·∫´n thi·∫øu (∆∞u ti√™n c√°c s·ªë ch∆∞a c√≥)
      final backupNumbers = [
        1,
        6,
        2,
        7,
        3,
        8,
        4,
        9,
        5,
        0
      ]; // Th·ª© t·ª± Th·ªßy, H·ªèa, M·ªôc, Kim, Th·ªï
      int currentBackupIndex = 0;
      while (result.length < 3 && currentBackupIndex < backupNumbers.length) {
        final numToAdd = backupNumbers[currentBackupIndex];
        if (!result.contains(numToAdd)) {
          result.add(numToAdd);
          // LoggerUtils.debug("LuckyNumbers - B·ªï sung d·ª± ph√≤ng: $numToAdd");
        }
        currentBackupIndex++;
      }

      final seedValue = selectedDate.year * 10000 +
          selectedDate.month * 100 +
          selectedDate.day;
      final random = Random(seedValue);
      result.shuffle(random);
      // LoggerUtils.debug("LuckyNumbers - Final Shuffled: $result");

      return result.take(3).toList();
    } catch (e, s) {
      LoggerUtils.error(
          'LuckyElements: L·ªói khi t√≠nh s·ªë may m·∫Øn (ƒë√£ refactor)', e, s);
      return [3, 7, 9];
    }
  }

  /// T√≠nh s·ªë KUA d·ª±a tr√™n nƒÉm sinh v√† gi·ªõi t√≠nh
  static int _calculateKuaNumber(DateTime birthDate, bool isMale) {
    final lunarBirth = LunarService.getSolarToLunar(birthDate);
    int year = lunarBirth.year;

    int sum = 0;
    while (year > 0) {
      sum += year % 10;
      year ~/= 10;
    }
    int baseNumber = _reduceSingleDigit(sum);

    int kuaNumber;
    if (isMale) {
      kuaNumber = 11 - baseNumber;
    } else {
      kuaNumber = baseNumber + 4;
    }

    kuaNumber = _reduceSingleDigit(kuaNumber);

    if (kuaNumber == 5) {
      kuaNumber = isMale ? 2 : 8;
    }
    if (kuaNumber == 0) kuaNumber = 9; // Theo quy ∆∞·ªõc ph·ªï bi·∫øn

    return kuaNumber;
  }

  /// L·∫•y th√¥ng tin ng≈© h√†nh t·ª´ ng√†y
  static Map<String, dynamic> _getHanhInfo(DateTime date, bool isYearHanh) {
    try {
      if (isYearHanh) {
        final String canChiYear = LunarService.getCanChiYear(date);
        return _getNapAmFromCanChi(canChiYear);
      } else {
        return LunarService.getHanhOfDay(date);
      }
    } catch (e) {
      LoggerUtils.error('LuckyElements: Error getting hanh info', e);
      return {
        'canChi': isYearHanh
            ? LunarService.getCanChiYear(date)
            : LunarService.getCanChiDay(date),
        'canHanh': 'Kim',
        'chiHanh': 'Th·ªßy',
        'napAm': 'B√≠ch Th∆∞·ª£ng Th·ªï',
        'napAmHanh': 'Th·ªï'
      };
    }
  }

  /// L·∫•y N·∫°p √Çm v√† Ng≈© H√†nh t·ª´ Can Chi
  static Map<String, dynamic> _getNapAmFromCanChi(String canChi) {
    final napAmData = TimeConstant.napAmTable[canChi] ??
        {"napAm": "B√≠ch Th∆∞·ª£ng Th·ªï", "hanh": "Th·ªï"};

    final parts = canChi.split(' ');
    if (parts.length != 2) {
      return {
        'canChi': canChi,
        'canHanh': 'Kim',
        'chiHanh': 'Th·ªßy',
        'napAm': napAmData['napAm'] ?? 'B√≠ch Th∆∞·ª£ng Th·ªï',
        'napAmHanh': napAmData['hanh'] ?? 'Th·ªï',
      };
    }

    final can = parts[0];
    final chi = parts[1];

    return {
      'canChi': canChi,
      'canHanh': TimeConstant.canToHanh[can] ?? 'Kim',
      'chiHanh': TimeConstant.chiToHanh[chi] ?? 'Th·ªßy',
      'napAm': napAmData['napAm'] ?? 'B√≠ch Th∆∞·ª£ng Th·ªï',
      'napAmHanh': napAmData['hanh'] ?? 'Th·ªï',
    };
  }


  /// Gi·∫£m s·ªë xu·ªëng th√†nh 1 ch·ªØ s·ªë (0-9), x·ª≠ l√Ω s·ªë 0 -> 9
  static int _reduceSingleDigit(int number) {
    if (number < 0) number = -number;
    if (number == 0) return 9; // Kua s·ªë 0 quy v·ªÅ 9

    while (number > 9) {
      int sum = 0;
      String digits = number.toString();
      for (int i = 0; i < digits.length; i++) {
        sum += int.parse(digits[i]);
      }
      number = sum;
    }
    return number == 0 ? 9 : number; // ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o kh√¥ng bao gi·ªù tr·∫£ v·ªÅ 0
  }

  /// T√≠nh Life Path Number t·ª´ ng√†y sinh
  static int _calculateLifePath(DateTime birthDate) {
    int day = birthDate.day;
    int month = birthDate.month;
    int year = birthDate.year;

    int reducedDay = _reduceSingleDigit(day);
    int reducedMonth = _reduceSingleDigit(month);
    int reducedYear = _reduceSingleDigit(year);

    int sum = reducedDay + reducedMonth + reducedYear;
    return _reduceSingleDigit(sum);
  }

  // H√†m _getNumberFromStar kh√¥ng c√≤n ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng trong logic m·ªõi
}
```
